questions: My  _  is blue and my  _  is black.
article: What's this? It's P. What color is it? It's green. What's this and what color is it? It's E. It's yellow. What's this? It's N. It's red. What's this? It's a pen. Spell it,please. P--E---N. I have  a blue pen. This my ruler. It's yellow. My jacket is black and my quilt is green. It's nice.
